name: TheAnswerDallas
0:
”Alexa, play The Answer Dallas”
”Alexa, ask The Answer Dallas to play”
”Alexa, tell The Answer Dallas to play”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the answer dallas
des: 660 AM The ANSWER is a Newstalk radio station based in Dallas, TX, that offers conservative news programming, political discussions and debates. You can listen live, find our station schedule and hear all of the latest breaking news.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
